scripts.deploy: shx rm -rf build/deploy/products && shx rm -rf build/deploy/public && shx rm -rf build/deploy/studio && lerna run deploy --parallel --ignore @appserver/common --ignore @appserver/components && shx cp -r public build/deploy && yarn sw-build
scripts.deploy:personal: shx rm -rf build/deploy/products && shx rm -rf build/deploy/public && shx rm -rf build/deploy/studio && lerna run deploy --parallel --scope {@appserver/studio,@appserver/people,@appserver/files,@appserver/editor} && shx cp -r public build/deploy && yarn sw-build:personal
scripts.sw-build: workbox injectManifest config/workbox-config.js && yarn sw-modify && yarn sw-minimize
scripts.sw-build:personal: workbox injectManifest config/workbox-config.js && yarn sw-modify:personal && yarn sw-minimize
scripts.sw-modify: yarn sw-calendar-replace && yarn sw-crm-replace && yarn sw-files-replace && yarn sw-files-editor-replace && yarn sw-mail-replace && yarn sw-people-replace && yarn sw-projects-replace && yarn sw-studio-replace && yarn sw-studio-login-replace && yarn sw-public-replace
scripts.sw-modify:personal: yarn sw-files-replace && yarn sw-files-editor-replace && yarn sw-people-replace && yarn sw-studio-replace && yarn sw-public-replace
scripts.wipe: shx rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock web/**/node_modules products/**/node_modules
